abstract: NBA Roundup; NBA announces five-year deal with Tencent Holdings Limited to carry games and other content on its digital platforms in China; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. announced a five-year deal said to be worth at least $500 million with Tencent Holdings to carry games, highlights and other league content.
snippet: The N.B.A. announced a five-year deal said to be worth at least $500 million with Tencent Holdings to carry games, highlights and other league content.

headline.main: N.B.A. Signs Deal With Chinese Internet Giant
